metadata.title: CVE-2023-3312 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in drivers/cpufreq/qcom-cpufreq-hw.c in cpufreqsubsystem in the Linux Kernel. This flaw, during device unbind will lead todouble release problem leading to denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
